CharacterStyleRange.Content: Undead who are commanded to throw themselves into the pit must head directly for the pit. If they are attacked or take damage, they will stop and no longer be under the command’s influence; they can not be commanded the next

Undead who are commanded to throw themselves into the pit must head directly for the pit. If they are attacked or take damage, they will stop and no longer be under the command’s influence; they can not be commanded the next turn.
